DOC.brief_summary: The investigator explore effect omission breakfast postprandial hyperglycemia insulin intact GLP-1 response subsequent meal type 2 diabetic patient
DOC.detailed_description: In obesity type 2 diabetes eat behavior especially lack breakfast promote weight gain , increase hunger carbohydrate craving . The present study design address whether T2D , change meal timing ; specifically , add calorie , protein carbohydrate breakfast vs.the omission breakfast influence postprandial elevation glucose , insulin , intact GLP-1 , glucagon free fatty acid ( FFA ) subsequent meal lunch dinner . The investigator expect compare day breakfast condition day breakfast omit postprandial glucose , free fattly acid , glucagon response lunch dinner significative high insulin intact GLP-1 response lunch dinner reduce
DOC.criteria: 1 . Type 2 diabetic < 10yr 2 . HbA1C : 79 % 3 . BMI : 22 35 kg/m2 ) 4 . Age : ≥30 ≤70 year age 5 . Habitually eat breakfast 6 . Naïve treat oral antidiabetic drug antihypertensive lipidlowering medication 7 . Those treated insulin GLP1 analog major liver , heart kidney illness exclude . 8 . Usually wake 06:00 07:00 go sleep 22:00 24:00 . 9 . Not diet change body weight > 10 lb = 4.5 kg within last 6 month 10 . Stable physical activity pattern three month immediately precede study initiation 11 . Normal liver kidney function 12 No metabolic disease diabetes 13 . Usually wake 05:00 07:00 go sleep 22:00 24:00 . 15 . Normal TSH FT4 level 16 . Acceptable health base interview , medical history , physical examination , laboratory test 17 . Those provide sign informed consent 1 . Type 1 diabetes 2 . Pulmonary disease , psychiatric , immunological , neoplastic disease severe diabetic complication , cardiovascular disease , cerebrovascular disease , proliferative diabetic retinopathy , gastroparesis underwent bariatric surgery . 3 . Abnormal liver function test define increase factor least 2 upper normal limit alanine aminotransferase and/or aspartate 4 . Anemia ( Hg > 10g/dL ) 5 . Serum creatinine level > 1.5 mg/dl 6 . Pregnant lactate 7 . Participating another dietary program use weightloss medication 8 . Documented suspected history ( within one year ) illicit drug abuse alcoholism . 9 . Use psychotropic anoretic medication month immediately prior study onset 13.Work shift within last 5 year cross time zone within last month study .
